Constructor for initializing an error message indicating the method name that is unsupported.

<Note>
  `MethodUnsupportedError` extends `BaseError`, see the docs for BaseError for
  all supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

```ts
import { MethodUnsupportedError } from "@alchemy/common";
```

## Parameters

### method

`string`

- The name of the unsupported method
